content.text:
# Night of Battle

"Night of Battle" is a Sailor Steve Costigan short story by Robert E. Howard.  It was originally published in the March 1932 issue of Fight Stories.
The story is now in the public domain.
References
External links
* [http://www.howardworks.com/subject.htm#costigan List of stories and publication details at Howard Works]
